He who conquers himself conquers the world.
My tomorrow depends on my choices today.
My today is someone else\'s desired future.
Pleasure is short, regret is long.
Those who endure best are those who can do anything best.
Patience is the first law of success.
What those who fail to grasp success lack is not talent, but perseverance.

Change your thoughts and your actions will change,
change your actions and your habits will change,
change your habits and your character will change,
change your character and your destiny will change.
I am different today than I was yesterday. That is growth.
For a better today than yesterday.
Having patience alone gives you great and noble power.
Patience and time do more than strength and passion.
Patience strengthens the soul, brings good mood, controls anger,\neliminates jealousy, suppresses pride, and controls speech.
Patience harvests peace, haste harvests regret.
Perseverance is the best quality,\nand patience is the passion of a noble heart.
Great things are achieved through patience and effort.
Nothing comes without pain.
Don\'t give up because it\'s hard now.\nTomorrow will be better.
Success is not the end, but the process.
When small things are valued, big things are achieved.
Action is the power that turns dreams into reality.
Endless patience makes everything possible.
Great people show greatness even in small things.
The secret of success is pursuing everything with persistence.
Difficulties must be overcome through challenges.
Failure is the mother of success. Don\'t be afraid of failure.
Nothing is impossible with persistence and effort.
Believe in yourself and keep going forward.\nThe path will open.
Live each day to the fullest.\nThe results will be great.
Enduring hardship is true strength.
Determination makes us start,\nbut perseverance makes us complete.
Today\'s failure is the foundation for tomorrow\'s success.
Believe in yourself and move forward.\nEverything you imagine can become reality.
Hardships and adversity are nutrients for our growth.
Small successes build up to create big success.
Don\'t give up. Success is just one step away.
Time solves everything.\nHave patience and wait.
Getting better little by little each day leads to big changes.
Consistency is true ability.
The secret of success is moving forward continuously toward the goal.
What you need to get results are\neffort, persistence, and time.
Don\'t give up, but challenge whenever difficulties come.
When faithful to small things, you achieve great results.
Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
The path to success is long and rough,\nbut you will surely arrive if you don\'t give up.
Today\'s patience creates tomorrow\'s success.
Those who never give up ultimately win.
Achieve your goals with persistence and passion.
Effort never betrays.
When patience and effort combine,\ngreat achievements are made.
As long as you don\'t give up,\nno one can break you.
In every difficult moment,\ncomes an opportunity to become stronger.
Success is the result of waiting and patience.
